alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 2:06PM MST until February 03 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT MST WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches. The heaviest amounts will occur near the mountains and across southern Pueblo county. * WHERE...Pueblo County and the lower elevations of western Las Animas county. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to midnight MST Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
